name: Chamaco The Taco
description:
Description

Chamaco The Taco is a puzzle plataformer game with a colorful flat art style.

As Chamaco you should use your hat and your jump skills to avoid the obstacles.

You can shoot the hat and jump over, get back the hat and also destroy some blocks with it.

Controls

Jump: W, Space or arrow up.
Right: D or arrow right.
Left: A or arrow left.
Go down: S or arrow down.
Shoot/Get back the hat: Enter.

F1 toggles the fullscreen mode(in main menu only)

Credits

Thanks for playing!

Check out my twitter to view the evolution of the game :)
@sverdeGD
